author: Ngoc Duc
title: Production-Grade Named Entity Recognition for Customer Service
description: An advanced speech-to-text and NER pipeline extracting critical business entities from customer service calls, enabling automated ticket routing, product issue tracking, and comprehensive service intelligence analytics.

main_image.caption: NER system dashboard showing real-time entity extraction from customer service conversations

problem_statement.text: **Manual Information Extraction**: Customer service representatives spend significant time manually extracting order numbers, product names, and issue descriptions from calls, leading to delays and inconsistent data capture.
**Inconsistent Ticket Routing**: Lack of automated entity recognition results in tickets being misrouted to wrong departments, increasing resolution time and customer frustration.
**Lost Business Intelligence**: Critical product feedback and issue patterns remain hidden in unstructured call transcripts, missing opportunities for product improvements and trend identification.

**Language Complexity Challenges**: Vietnamese language nuances, technical product terminology, and speech-to-text errors create significant challenges for accurate entity extraction in production environments.

my_role.text: **NLP Architecture Lead**: Designed end-to-end pipeline combining advanced speech recognition with BERT-based entity extraction, achieving 93% accuracy in Vietnamese product entity identification.
**Domain Adaptation Specialist**: Developed custom entity types and training data for product domains, creating specialized models for order processing, technical support, and complaint handling.
**Production Integration Engineer**: Built real-time processing system handling live customer calls with sub-second entity extraction and automatic CRM integration for seamless workflow automation.
**Quality Assurance Architect**: Implemented confidence scoring, entity linking validation, and human-in-the-loop verification ensuring production-grade accuracy and reliability.

technical_solution.text: **Advanced Speech-to-Text Pipeline**: Integrated state-of-the-art ASR models optimized for Vietnamese language with noise reduction, speaker diarization, and real-time transcription capabilities achieving 95% accuracy.

**BERT-based Entity Extraction**: Fine-tuned Vietnamese BERT models for customer service domain with specialized entity types including ORDER_NUMBER, PRODUCT_NAME, ISSUE_DESCRIPTION, CUSTOMER_ID, and RESOLUTION_STATUS.

**Two-Stage Processing Architecture**: Implemented cascaded NER approach with coarse-grained type classification followed by fine-grained entity extraction, improving accuracy through specialized model training.

technical_solution.caption: End-to-end NER pipeline showing speech processing, entity extraction, and business system integration

technical_solution.text: **Entity Linking and Validation**: Built comprehensive product database integration with fuzzy matching, confidence scoring, and automatic validation ensuring extracted entities match actual business records.

**Context-Aware Disambiguation**: Developed sophisticated context analysis resolving entity ambiguity using conversation history, customer profile data, and business rules for accurate classification.
**Real-time Processing Framework**: Implemented streaming data architecture processing live calls with immediate entity extraction, confidence assessment, and automated action triggering.

measurement_improvement.text: **Entity Extraction Accuracy**: Achieved 93% F1-score for Vietnamese product entity recognition with 95% precision in order number detection and 91% accuracy in issue classification.
**Processing Speed**: Delivered real-time entity extraction with average processing time of 150ms per call segment, enabling immediate insights and automated actions.
**Ticket Routing Efficiency**: Improved automated routing accuracy by 75% through precise entity-based classification, reducing average resolution time by 40%.
**Data Quality Enhancement**: Increased structured data capture from customer calls by 300%, providing comprehensive business intelligence for product and service improvements.
**Operational Cost Reduction**: Reduced manual data entry time by 80% through automated entity extraction and CRM integration, saving 20+ hours weekly per agent.

implementation_integration.text: **CRM System Integration**: Seamless integration with Salesforce, HubSpot, and custom CRM systems automatically populating tickets with extracted entities and customer context.
**Call Center Platform Integration**: Direct integration with major call center platforms providing real-time entity overlay during live calls and automated post-call processing.
**Business Intelligence Pipeline**: Built comprehensive analytics dashboard tracking product issues, customer sentiment, and service trends through extracted entity patterns.
**Quality Assurance Framework**: Implemented human-in-the-loop validation system enabling continuous model improvement through expert feedback and edge case handling.

real_world_impact.text: **Customer Service Transformation**: Enabled automatic extraction of critical information from 1000+ daily calls, improving service quality and reducing manual workload significantly.
**Product Intelligence Enhancement**: Provided detailed insights into product issues and customer feedback patterns, directly informing product development priorities and quality improvements.
**Operational Efficiency Gains**: Reduced average call processing time by 35% through automated information capture and intelligent ticket routing based on extracted entities.
**Business Analytics Revolution**: Transformed unstructured call data into structured business intelligence, enabling data-driven decisions for service optimization and product strategy.

company_alignment.text: **Customer Experience Excellence**: Directly supported organizational goals for superior customer service through intelligent automation and faster issue resolution.
**Operational Efficiency Focus**: Aligned with strategic initiatives to optimize business processes through AI-powered automation and data-driven insights.
**Innovation Leadership**: Demonstrated advanced expertise in production NLP systems, positioning company as leader in customer service AI technology.
